"Complete a certain Client Order.":
"This is a training mission in VR space
based on infiltrating a giant enemy ship.
We've surveyed the technology they've
deployed across various planets, and used
our findings to create a simulation even
more challenging than the infiltration
missions we've conducted before.
Use your abilities to their fullest.
――――――――――――――――――――
Defeat the final enemy to clear"

"The training is about to begin!
Your objective is to enter a high-
security sector and defeat the
enemy guarding the main reactor."

"First, you'll need to take control
of all nearby secure sectors and
clear a route to the central area."

"I'll guide you through each section.
Now, let's start the training!"

"We've placed a powerful enemy to
guard the main reactor. Your mission
is to defeat the Gildina Execour."

"It'll be a tough fight, but I know
you can win! Good luck in there!"
